resources.string: Then, the selected note positions will appear in the tablature
And you will see it\'s name here
You can also add an accidental to the selected note by clicking on the sharp and flat buttons.
Remember, the notes shown in this tablature are not chords, they are the possible positions of an individual note.

Hello! Take a look at this awesome app!

%1s
%2s

This tool was made with the objective of helping classical guitar students in memorizing the positions of score notes on the neck of a guitar.

Suggestions are welcome!
If you have any feature or improvements that you would like to see in this app, please contact us by clicking here.
